title: Death Stranding Is Coming To PC - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.28.19
description:
Right now, go to http://escapetheinvasion.com/kfgames for 20% off your first box.

Quip starts at just $25 and you’ll get your first refill FREE at http://getquip.com/games.

Imran and Tim go over Death Stranding coming to PC, Epic suing Fortnite leakers, EA returning to Steam, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:03:00 - Housekeeping
Extra Life is Saturday 11/2! 24 hours of games for charity! Join us now at kindafunny.com/extralife or watch on the day!
The Roper Report   -
00:04:57 - Death Stranding Is Coming To PC
00:23:08 - Luigi’s Mansion 3 Review Roundup
00:38:48 - Epic Games suing Fortnite tester who leaked Chapter 2
00:48:07 - Sony considering sale of PlayStation Vue
00:52:32 - Quip
00:54:14 -  Escape the Invasion
00:55:38 - Out today
Reader mail   -
00:57:44 - “If everything is correct EA Origin is still going to be a thing so why are they putting games on steam?” - Frankfurtter
01:02:05 - “Over the weekend it came to light that the new Call of Duty Modern Warfare campaign features a fictionalized version of a real world war crime…” - The 5 Star Man
01:06:29 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Imran
